mapper.insert: insert into injection_label_grp_mbr (GRP_MBR_ID, GRP_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{grpMbrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{grpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update injection_label_grp_mbr set GRP_ID = #{grpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GRP_MBR_ID = #{grpMbrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select GRP_MBR_ID, GRP_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_grp_mbr where GRP_MBR_ID = #{grpMbrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select GRP_MBR_ID, GRP_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_grp_mbr
